item.title: Kreido Biofuels Inc 10-K
item.description: Kreido Biofuels Inc, which is in the Industrial Organic Chemicals [2860] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 18, 2022 had 8732 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 139 instances financial - 124 instances executive - 90 instances december - 89 instances officer - 87 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
